# @ecuapi/sdk

Official Node.js/TypeScript SDK for ECUAPI - Electronic Invoicing API for Ecuador.

## Installation

```bash
npm install @ecuapi/sdk
# or
bun add @ecuapi/sdk
```

## Usage

```typescript
import { createClient } from "@ecuapi/sdk";

const api = createClient();
// SDK methods auto-generated from OpenAPI spec
```

## Development

```bash
bun install
bun run generate  # Regenerate from OpenAPI spec
bun run build     # Build for distribution
```
